channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Transformative Power Of AI And Machine Learning On Healthcare Insurance
item.description: As the sector evolves, AI and ML offer measurable business value while improving health outcomes for potentially millions of policyholders.

item.title: Clarifying The Latest AI Advancements
item.description: Another “invisible” AI advancement is improvements to the training of large language models (LLMs), which have a high cost and energy expenditure.

item.title: The opposite of a good idea…
item.description: might also be a good idea. The hard part isn’t finding proof before you begin. The hard part is beginning, knowing you might not succeed.

item.title: Salt Typhoon: A Wake-Up Call For Strengthening Telecom Cybersecurity
item.description: Our networks are the lifeblood of national security and global commerce. Protecting them is not merely an option—it is an imperative.
